𓇷 𓇸 𓇹 𓇺

𔓷 ha halb half •hel 🌕🌞☼
ⵀ H/B halb ھ ب h/b yah = yab @ Tuareg ⴱ ה B ≈ 𓇷 bowl 𓊪 𓎼 𓎸 (Becher) 𓊪 𓎼 𓇷 𓂡 part open 𓇷 halb half-moon 𓊪 𓊃 𓂧 𓈖 𓇷 | the new moon and its festival | Fasten Fest passover 𓇸 ¼ quarter-moon?

𜏼 𜏃 su₂ 𒄮 sur₃ 𓇳 šure 𓇷 סהרא sahrā 𒌗 𒌓 𒄭 𒌓 semi ⵙ sol @ Byblos

𒄭 ḫi 𔓷 H ⵀ YAH ⴱ YAB halb hell 𜏄 𜏇 H @ Anatolian / Elamite

𓇷 «9 moon»
𓇷 Ennead nine gods
N9+ anew 𓇷 Ennead <= 𓇸 new=neun 9 ⇔ Anubis? pochend/opun

𓊪 𓊃 𓂧 𓈖 𓇷 new moon (festival)

𓇻 Semi-Duat 𓇽 Semi-date "Semdet" 𓇷 𓇸 Half-moon ⇔ Sambet 7 day week
